headline: How Investors May Respond To Salesforce (CRM) Q3 Beat And Surging Enterprise AI Adoption
summary: In recent weeks, Salesforce reported record third-quarter fiscal 2026 results, raised its full-year guidance, and highlighted rapid adoption of its AI products Agentforce and Data 360, underpinned by new deployments at organizations such as Novartis, the U.S. Department of Transportation, and DeVry University. These developments point to Salesforce’s AI platform becoming more deeply embedded in critical workflows across healthcare, government, and education, potentially reinforcing customer...
